revised_title: Synroc-Type Hollandites: Phase Chemistry and Immobilization of Radioactive Wastes
tldr: This article investigates the phase chemistry of Synroc-type hollandites and their potential for immobilizing radioactive wastes. The study demonstrates that all barium, caesium, and rubidium can be successfully incorporated into hollandite when certain conditions are met, ensuring the safety of radioactive waste management. The article also discusses the crystal chemistry and solid-solution relationships of the hollandite series.
